00001 import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
00002 import java.text.DecimalFormat;
00003 
00013 public class SlopePerformanceTest
00014 {
00015     public static final String[] TEST_NAMES = { "Trigonometric Test #1",
00016                                                 "Trigonometric Test #2",
00017                                                 "Identity Test",
00018                                                 "Countdown Identity Test",
00019                                                 "Empty Loop Test" };
00020     public static final int NUM_TESTS = TEST_NAMES.length;
00021     public static final int MAX_SLOPE = 100;
00022     public static final double LENGTH = 100;
00023 
00024     public static void main(String[] args)
00025     {
00026         if(args.length == 0)
00027         {
00028             System.out.println("Usage SlopePerformanceTest <iterations>");
00029             System.out.println(" iterations is the number of slopes to generate");
00030             return;
00031         }
00032         double[] slopes = new double[Integer.parseInt(args[0])];
00033 
00034         for(int i = 0; i < slopes.length; i++)
00035         {
00036             slopes[i] = Math.random() * 2 * MAX_SLOPE - MAX_SLOPE;
00037         }
00038 
00039         System.out.println("Generated " + slopes.length + " random slope" +
00040                            (slopes.length == 1 ? "" : "s"));
00041 
00042         int test = (int)(Math.random() * NUM_TESTS);
00043         long[] times = new long[NUM_TESTS];
00044         for(int count = 0; count < NUM_TESTS; count++)
00045         {
00046             test = (test + 1) % NUM_TESTS;
00047             System.out.println("Running: " + TEST_NAMES[test]);
00048             long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
00049             switch(test)
00050             {
00051             case 0:
00052                 for(int i = 0; i < slopes.length; i++)
00053                 {
00054                     double theta = Math.atan(slopes[i]);
00055                     double x = LENGTH * Math.cos(theta);
00056                     double y = LENGTH * Math.sin(theta);
00057                 }
00058                 break;
00059             case 1:
00060                 for(int i = 0; i < slopes.length; i++)
00061                 {
00062                     double theta = Math.atan(slopes[i]);
00063                     double x = LENGTH * Math.cos(theta);
00064                     double y = slopes[i] * x;
00065                 }
00066                 break;
00067             case 2:
00068                 for(int i = 0; i < slopes.length; i++)
00069                 {
00070                     double x = LENGTH / Math.sqrt(1 + slopes[i] * slopes[i]);
00071                     double y = slopes[i] * x;
00072                 }
00073                 break;
00074             case 3:
00075                 for(int i = slopes.length - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00076                 {
00077                     double x = LENGTH / Math.sqrt(1 + slopes[i] * slopes[i]);
00078                     double y = slopes[i] * x;
00079                 }
00080                 break;
00081             case 4:
00082                 for(int i = 0; i < slopes.length; i++)
00083                 {
00084                 }
00085             }
00086             times[test] = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
00087         }
00088 
00089         int fastestIndex = 0;
00090         for(int i = 1; i < NUM_TESTS; i++)
00091         {
00092             if(times[i] < times[fastestIndex])
00093             {
00094                 fastestIndex = i;
00095             }
00096         }
00097         
00098         System.out.println("The fastest time was \"" + TEST_NAMES[fastestIndex] + "\"");
00099         
00100         DecimalFormat format = new DecimalFormat("##.0000");
00101 
00102         System.out.println("The times for each test were:");
00103         for(int i = 0; i < NUM_TESTS; i++)
00104         {
00105             long delta = times[i] - times[fastestIndex];
00106             double factor = (double)times[i] / times[fastestIndex];
00107             System.out.print("  " + times[i] + "ms ");
00108             System.out.print("[+" + delta + "ms] ");
00109             if(factor != 1)
00110             {
00111                 System.out.print("(" + format.format(factor) + "x) ");
00112             }
00113             System.out.println(TEST_NAMES[i]);
00114         }
00115     }
00116 }
